subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Weather
lead_paragraph: With Pole Day rained out for the third time in four years and more rain possible Sunday, track officials were scrambling Saturday to devise contingency plans for qualifying for the Indianapolis 500.
snippet: With Pole Day rained out for the third time in four years and more rain possible Sunday, track officials were scrambling Saturday to devise contingency plans for qualifying for the Indianapolis 500.
